abstracts.cdata!:
The project aims at assisting the
            Planning Directorate of the Ministry of Planning and
            Industry to improve project selection; the Industrial
            Directorate of the Ministry of Planning and industry to
            develop an efficient industrial policy; the Ministry of
            Agriculture to strengthen its policy planning and project
            preparation capacity; the Ministry of Scientific Research to
            devise a research strategy; and finally at initiating new
            procedures which should help improve the management of eight
            public enterprises to serve as models for other enterprises.
            It provides for the financing of 44-1/2 man-years of
            resident specialists and 237 man-months of short-term consultancies.
